app.auction.onPause.owner: Please contact the user in the game and process the trade deal. Also you can try to pick another winner.

app.settings.verification.title: Settings | Verification
app.settings.verification.changeName.hin: Q: I changed my name, how to update it?
app.settings.verification.warning: To be able to use Market, please verify your account.
app.settings.verification.howTo.3: Compose new Message for our bot(WarMarketMan), you can use direct link: {link}
app.settings.verification.howTo.4: Fill the fields in this way:
app.settings.verification.howTo.6.2: Wait for verification, bot will check his Inbox every
app.settings.verification.howTo.7: If everything is fine, bot has read your message and the message was correct, your account will be verified.
app.settings.verification.howTo.hint: Your account will have the same name you have on the forum.{br}Make sure to enable {notificationLink} to get notified when the verification process is complete.
app.settings.subscription.title: Settings | Patronage
app.settings.subscription.subscriptionBo: Unlimited number of orders at the same time (100 default)
Unlimited number of bids and auctions at the same time (50 bids and 50 auctions - standard limit)
app.settings.subscription.subscriptionGe: To acquire appropriate subscription status and rewards.{br}You need to link your {patreon} account with {market} account.
app.settings.subscription.successfullyLi: Your patreon account successfully linked to your {market} account.{br}It will get sync with Patreon every hour. (Please be patient)
app.settings.subscription.permanentBonus: Total sum of your pledges, provides different independent bonuses
app.settings.subscription.faq.1.body: You need to register a patreon account and choose one of 4 available month subs
app.settings.subscription.faq.2.header: What does it mean that the rewards are permanent?
app.settings.subscription.faq.2.body: Them being permanent means that these rewards will stay with you forever. Once you receive the rewards, no given privileges will be revoked, even if you cancel the subscription later on.
app.settings.subscription.faq.3.body: No, reputation bonuses do not stack, only the highest reputation bonus will be taken into account.
app.settings.subscription.faq.4.body: It's for long term supporters. For example, if you were to donate us, cumulatively, 120$, we should find a way to reward this generosity.{br}This is exactly why diamond level is here, so that if you do donate us 120$, you will be awarded with Level 4 diamond badge. (120/30){br}Also, a special gauge will display your level progress, if you donate less, let's say 10$.

app.tos.title: Terms of use | Warframe Market
“Online in game” indicates you are ready to trade.{br}Depending on the item and price of your listing, you have 5 to 15 minutes to reply, when contacted by a trader.
“Online” means you prefer to be contacted on wf.m inbox/in-game, as you might be busy or in a mission and not readily available to trade.

Note - if you have the best price (within the top 5 traders as a seller or buyer), your status can be turned offline by wf.m, in case you do not reply within 5-15 mins, irrespective of activity status.

If you do not reply within a reasonable time, you can be suspended from 3-30 days, based on player reports or in case the wf.m team believes your listing is not genuine. This can lead to a permanent ban in case of frequent infractions.{br}You can contact us on the wf.m {discordLink} server for more details.

As a trader, in case you come across fake listings, you have the following options:{br}You can report the user using the reputation tool on the website.{br}You can also contact a wf.m moderator on the discord server.{br}Please have screenshots of the chat with timestamps activated (activate it in game settings).{br}Fake listings include, but aren’t limited to, listings marked “online in game” but offline in game, afk listings, or “just sold” but not removed from wf.m (can take up to 5 mins to update on the site).
app.tos.trading.listings.logIn: If you don’t log into wf.m within 7 days, your listings are automatically deactivated.{br}Your listings will remain safe in your account, where you can activate them again by turning them “visible”.
app.tos.trading.listings.multipleListeti: Multiple listings of the same item at different prices is not allowed unless they’re at different ranks, such as for arcanes. Duplicate riven auctions are also not allowed.
app.tos.trading.listings.limitOrders: There is a limit of 100 orders for free accounts, which can be extended by becoming a patreon user.{br}More details on {patreonLink}
app.tos.trading.priceChanges.1: Do not change prices in the standard copy paste message from wf.m.{br}If you do, kindly indicate the price change to the person you are contacting, so they know the price isn’t the same as their listed price.{br}Changing prices or items in the process of trading is not allowed. You should only sell or buy items for the price that are defined on the listings on the site. Treat it as a public contract.
app.tos.trading.offerings.1: Refusing your own offers is not allowed. This includes attempting to only sell in bulk because this cannot be enforced.{br}Stopping the communication without explanation is not encouraged.{br}Blocking the contector without explanation is not encouraged.
app.tos.trading.behavior.1: Calling the contactor names is not allowed.{br}Rude behavior is not allowed.{br}Do not goad the other person or instigate a fight.
app.tos.trading.statistics.1: Attempts to deceive the statistics page data by closing fake orders (aka “sold” Akbronco Prime for 10k platinum) will lead to a permanent account ban.
app.tos.trading.requirements.1: Before Contacting please check the Trading requirements of the item + your own trading eligibility.{br}You have to be MR2 +  have Two-Factor Authentication (2FA) activated on {warframeLink}{br}These include Trading Tax, Mastery Rank and Platinum.{br}Note that starting / gifted / coupon Platinum is not tradable.
app.tos.account.avatarsAndBack.1: Obscene or indecent avatars and backgrounds are not allowed.
app.tos.account.userName.1: Using a Username which does not exist in the game is not allowed. The /profile chat command can be used to determine if a username exists or if the user has ever logged in.{br}Reverify yourself on wf.m, if you have changed your name from the original name you signed up with. Contact a wf.m Moderator on discord in case you are having problems with this. If your Forum Name did not Update after the name change, please contact DE’s Support here: {supportUs}.
app.tos.api.dataUsage.1: Scraping data and using our API is allowed at a reasonable scale.{br}The limit is 3 requests per second.{br}We reserve the right to block access for any app/service that attempt to use our data.
app.tos.noteText: We will not receive reports submitted using the in-game reporting system because we have no affiliation with Digital Extremes as per the site disclaimer.
app.faq.title: F.A.Q. | Warframe Market
app.faq.de_disclaimer: Is this site related to Digital Extremes?
app.faq.de_disclaimer.description: Nope, this site was made by 42bytes (independent devs).{br}We are not associated with Digital Extremes, and merely made this site to make trading easier.{br}Please do not contact DE’s support with inquiries about this site. If you have questions/problems, contact us by mail.
app.faq.contact_support: How I can get in touch with your support?
app.faq.how_to.description.1: If you wish to look through some orders just use the search function on the home page and contact the buyer/seller.
app.faq.how_to.description.2: If you want to place an order, you must be registered on our site. We have 2 options:
app.faq.how_to.description.2.standalone: Registration by our standalone system (See below).
app.faq.how_to.description.3: After registration and verification of your in-game name, you can place orders.
app.faq.how_to.description.4.warn: Don’t forget to update your in-game online status - use the switcher on top right corner (menu)
app.faq.how_to.description.5: Other users will see your status, and if you’re online they can contact you directly via an in-game Private Message.
app.faq.verification_why: Why do you need to verify my in-game name?
app.faq.verification_why.description: We don't want to see fake accounts and fake orders on our site.{br}It would create a bad experience for everyone.{br}We apologize if it means a few more minutes of setting up before you can trade, but this is a necessary procedure.
app.faq.mail_usage: How will you use my mail?
app.faq.mail_usage.description: Currently - only for login purposes.{br}You won’t receive any messages from us. If we’ll introduce some sort of email notifications in the future, we’ll let you know in advance and provide an option to enable/disable the new features.
app.faq.info_we_know: What type of information will your service know about me?
app.faq.info_we_know.description: If you use our standalone login, we’ll know your email.{br}You can use a fake email, it's your choice, and how we use your address is described above.{br}If you use Steam login, we’ll know your steam name and steam id.
app.faq.password_storage: How do you store my password?
app.faq.password_storage.description: Your password isn’t stored in our DB directly.{br}Instead, we store a HASH (by using {link}) generated on the basis of your password and some salt.{br}So no one – not even us – can get your password, don’t worry.
app.faq.change_my_name: I changed my name in game, how can i change it here on site?
app.faq.change_my_name.description: You can re-verify your account, it will take your name from forum.{br}If forum still displays your old name, just relogin(on forum!).{br}If nothing helps, send us a mail with your old name and new one.
app.faq.enable_notifications.description: If your browser blocks notifications and you want to enable them, you can do so very easily.
app.faq.enable_notifications.chrome.desc: 1. On the top left corner of your browser, right before the address bar, click on the information icon -> {infoIcon}{br}2. Switch Notifications to `Allow`
app.faq.enable_notifications.firefox.des: 1. On the top left corner of your browser, right before the address bar, click on the information icon -> {infoIcon}{br}2. Click `Preferences`{br}3. Click Notifications settings{br}4. Find warframe.market{br}5. Switch status to `Allow`
